title: Elenva Watch
summary: Elenva is a colorful digital / analog watchface with weather information.
description: Elenva is a colorful digital/analog watchface with:★ Multiple themes★ Weather condition★ 24h/12h time format★ second pointer with smoth or tick movement★ Date and days of week★ imperial /  metric format systemElenva is brought to you from MDRN.WATCH company. MDRN is a company with the commitment to deliver the best kind of watchfaces to your smartwatch. From rich and dynamic watches to classic designs, MDRN aims make a beautiful design piece to be used in any occasion.
descriptionHTML:
Elenva is a colorful digital/analog watchface with:

★ Multiple themes
★ Weather condition
★ 24h/12h time format
★ second pointer with smoth or tick movement
★ Date and days of week
★ imperial / metric format system

Elenva is brought to you from MDRN.WATCH company. MDRN is a company with the commitment to deliver the best kind of watchfaces to your smartwatch. From rich and dynamic watches to classic designs, MDRN aims make a beautiful design piece to be used in any occasion.
comments: Great watch face! I love how customizable this face is!
Great Nice watch face. I love it.
